title: Business Data Scientist - AdTech
description:
Job Description

Are you someone with a passion for digging into large distributed pools of data, unearthing insights, and transforming them into a visually compelling form that appeals both to technical and non-technical audiences? Then this is the job for you!
On a daily basis, you will be responsible for:
Performing data analysis on products managed by Dailymotion’s AdTech tribe, including our SSP that serves billions of requests daily, and extract actionable insights that will be used to drive decisions across the business
Statistically validating and A/B testing hypotheses generated by Business, Product and Data Science teams.
Driving the collection of new data that would help build the next generation of algorithms (E.g. audience segmentation, contextual targeting, bidder behavior monitoring)
Building easy to use dashboards (E.g. Tableau) to help visualize insights and KPIs interactively
Automating analysis into monitoring and alerting tools to continuously drive value for business owners
Proactively owning the end-to-end delivery of projects, from design, to development, testing, and operations.

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree, or higher, in Business, Finance, Statistics, or related field.
3 years of business / data analysis experience
Previous ad-tech experience (required)
Extensive experience solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches
Comfortable with manipulation and analysis of complex, high volume, high dimensional data from varying sources (E.g. SQL, AWS/GCP, Excel)
Solid Experience of Data Visualization Tools (E.g. Tableau suite)
Strong intellectual curiosity and ability to structure and solve difficult problems with minimal supervision
Ability to communicate complex quantitative analysis in a clear, precise and actionable manner in English. French is a plus.
A background in Machine Learning and Statistics is a plus
Programming in Python is a plus

Additional Information

Location: New York
Type of contract: Full-time
Start Date: ASAP
Flexible time off, vacation, holidays, sick-leave so you can take time off when you need to
Fitness club membership to NY Health & Racquet Club
100% healthcare coverage starting on day 1
Commuter benefits
401k Contribution
Paid parental leave
Fully stocked kitchens with free snacks and drinks
